task.prompt: A quarterback steps back to throw 80 times in a game.  30 percent of the time he does not get a pass thrown.  Half of the times that he does not throw the ball he is sacked for a loss.  How many times is the quarterback sacked for a loss in the game?

Half of the times that he does not throw the ball he is sacked for a loss.  How many times is the quarterback sacked for a loss in the game?
